author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Inspired by PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/36927, I propose few miscellaneous improvements:
   * 6f2db252565790a7e3b6538a0ddb091cda65e628: introduces coloring to the display / compare tables
   * ef889b49bf1c24fa50db291e69d4a66cff650a8f:  simplifies code to avoid repetition
   * f616b9665ddf5aedcc625e1f517b214a0244bde7: don't display identical prep or prod metadatas if they're identical, addressing https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/36927#issuecomment-1035464935
   * 286fc7290be9727bc3f31d655e1e79690529fda1 introduces some more code clean-up and improves naming to follow cmssw coding rules

#### PR validation:

Run the script in the test folder `CondCore/PhysicsToolsPlugins/test/test_DropBoxMetadata_PayloadInspector.sh`and got the following plots:

| vanilla  | this branch |
| ------------- | ------------- |
| ![DropBoxMetadata_Compare](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5082376/153596913-aef4c206-c189-4727-ac75-3e1ca1fe7c5c.png) |  ![DropBoxMetadata_Compare](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5082376/153604097-674f80a6-73e2-4e86-ab1b-381a205a2dfd.png) |
| ![DropBoxMetadata_CompareTwoTags](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5082376/153604136-f8d7b494-e295-4ee4-ab7b-829f3fc10800.png) |  ![DropBoxMetadata_CompareTwoTags](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5082376/153605428-83ceb9b3-2112-4449-84c7-a4788e8f6ce6.png) |

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A

attn: @tlampen
title: Improved Payload Inspector plots for `DropBoxMetaData`
